title: Mobile-Based Language Microlearning Course Design for Generation Z

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Fundamental Smartphone Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Modular language learning course implementable in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, focusing on strengthening job-linked practical language skills

learning_goals: Accurately perform three weekly practical language expressions (e.g., business conversation, interview responses) using 5-minute mobile content (videos/quizzes)
Apply over 10 situational vocabularies (e.g., email writing, negotiation expressions) to real work tasks via weekly interactive AI chat tools
Achieve over 80% performance in monthly mobile-based role-play assessments (e.g., virtual interview simulations)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
